taxon.author: Castanheira, Dimitrov, Baptista, Scharff & Framenau, 2025
taxon.distribution: Australia (Western Australia, South Australia, New South Wales, Victoria, Capital Territory)

referenceObject.reference: Castanheira, P. de S., Dimitrov, D., Baptista, R. L. C., Scharff, N. & Framenau, V. W. (2025). Taxonomy and systematics of the Australasian gum nut orb-weaving spider genus Carepalxis (Araneae, Araneidae). Invertebrate Systematics 39(IS25009): 1-45.
